response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and endeavors. Our product is not just an item; it's a solution designed to enhance efficiency and productivity. Given its value to you, we're offering it at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is a fantastic opportunity to acquire a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. Should you decide this is the right fit for you, please let me know, and we'll proceed with the transaction. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 9500}
